meanings.definition: The act or process of imploding.
meanings.sent1: The implosions of the balloons created a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The building's implosions were carefully controlled by demolition experts.
meanings.sent3: The implosions of the bubble wrap entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: The implosions of the star's career shocked the entertainment industry.
meanings.sent5: The implosions of the vacuum cleaner sucked in all the dirt effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The implosions of the sinkhole caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent2: The implosions of the collapsing building were heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The implosions of the cake as it was cut made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The implosions of the market sent shockwaves through the economy.
meanings.sent5: The implosions of the dying star were a sight to behold in the night sky.
